      Methods in zipkin2.v1 that return V1Span.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      V1Span.Builder V1Span.Builder.addAnnotation​(long timestamp, java.lang.String value, Endpoint endpoint)  
      V1Span.Builder V1Span.Builder.addBinaryAnnotation​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, Endpoint endpoint)
      Creates a tag annotation, which is the same as Span.tags() except duplicating the endpoint.
      V1Span.Builder V1Span.Builder.addBinaryAnnotation​(java.lang.String address, Endpoint endpoint)
      Creates an address annotation, which is the same as Span.remoteEndpoint()
